name: Drawdown Book Edition 1 Scenario 1
description: This scenario fits a linear curve to data from the IEA 2DS projection of mass transit adoption. The scenario was used in the Drawdown book edition 1, and has been updated.

name: Drawdown Book Edition 1 Scenario 2
description: This scenario fits a 3rd degree polynomial curve to data from the ITDP/UCDavis Global High Shift projection of mass transit adoption. The scenario was used in the Drawdown book edition 1, and has been updated.

name: 35% Adoption
description: This scenario represents a gradual increase of PT share to 35%
